summary: The "Save Our Sequoias Act" aims to improve the health and resilience of giant sequoias. It establishes a multi-agency coalition, mandates an assessment of sequoia groves, and outlines emergency response measures, including expedited fuel reduction projects.  The bill also sets up a reforestation strategy, strike teams, and grant programs. Provisions amend existing laws to facilitate collaboration and funding.  It has an authorization for appropriations and establishes a Giant Sequoia Emergency Protection Program and Fund.
